name: Window during nighttime
aria_label: Link to nighttime window on Codepen
desc: While scrolling through designs over on dribbble, I came across this illustration of a woman sitting in front a window. I tried recreating it using a bit of Markup and CSS. This drawing in particular was alot of fun because I've really enjoyed creating lamps/lighting effects lately.

image.alt: CSS drawing of a window with dark night sky background

name: Telephone booth
aria_label: Link to telephone booth on Codepen
desc: I'd seen this style of telephone booth in commercials, games and around the web so I finally created one. This red booth is based on a illustration from dribbble. Click inside the booth to turn the lights on/off.

image.alt: CSS drawing of a red telephone booth with blue background

name: Cassette Tape
aria_label: Link to cassette tape on Codepen
desc: This drawing of a cassette is one of my all time favorites. I went the endless box-shadow route here which I haven't used in my more recent illustrations. Nonetheless, a cool look compact cassette.

image.alt: CSS drawing of a cassette tape with blue background
